# Data modeling using ORM (контроль успеваемости студентов)

## Run project instructions:
1. Install docker

2. Init project
```shell
yarn run start
```

3. Open studio
```shell
yarn run studio
```

### [preview db structure](https://prismaliser.app?_CgogIGJpcnRoRGF5IERhdGVUaW1lCgogIHBob25lTnVtYmVyIFN0cmluZz8KICBlbWFpbCAgICAgICBTdHJpbmc_%3D%3D)
